title: Guys i need help, i can't play or even open Leauge
body:
Every time i open League it says:


C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\api-win-crt-multibyte-|1-10.dll
is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try
installing the program again using the original installing mwdia or
contact your system administrator or the softwere vendor for support.


Please help me, i have re-installed League and Repaired (used the repair option when you click the questione mark).
I don't know how to fix this, if you can fix this please help me.

Please help me or League will have 1 less support main, and we know how long the qeue is when there aren't any supp..

replies.body:
Hmm.. I dug into this error and it seems there may be missing Windows assets that League relies on. The following steps ought to help in sorting this out:

1. Run Windows update to ensure all available updates have been installed.
2. Install a fresh copy of Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 from [**here.**](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387)
3. Right-click the League icon and select *run as administrator*.

Let me know if this helped at all.
